feature_model.name: Aircraft PL

meta.data: A feature model of a simple aircraft product line
Markus Voelter, Using Domain-Specific Languages for Product Line Engineering, Tutorial at SPLC 2009, San Francisco, USA

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Aircraft :m Wing :g [1,*] : High : Shoulder : Low :o Engine :g [1,1] : Jet : Piston :m Materials :g [1,*] : Metal : Wood : Cloth : Plastic
